text: Stanley Norman Cohen (February 17, 1935) is an American geneticist. He was the Kwoh-Ting Li Professor in the Stanford University School of Medicine. Cohen and Herbert Boyer were the first scientists to transplant genes from one living organism to another. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:American geneticists Category:Living people Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:People from Perth Amboy, New Jersey
title: Stanley Norman Cohen
